Html: I've been evaluating the Touchless SDK for webcam image capture since we are looking for a camera-agnostic software interface.  Some of our customers want to be able to take images of documents.  While Touchless allows us to capture a larger image the clarity of the image isn't there.  Is there any way to improve the clarity or sharpness of the image captured?
